items/other/mill/butter/description: Butter made with cow's milk. Used in a variety of cooking recipes.
items/other/mill/cheese/description: Cheese made with cow's milk. Used in a variety of cooking recipes.
items/other/mill/deluxe_hay/description: Deluxe feed for large animals. It can be placed in barn troughs or hand-fed.
items/other/mill/deluxe_small_animal_fee: Deluxe feed for small animals. It can be placed in coop troughs or hand-fed.
items/other/mill/duck_mayonnaise/descrip: A popular condiment made from duck eggs. Used in a variety of cooking recipes.
items/other/mill/flour/description: A bag of processed wheat flour. Frequently used for baking.
items/other/mill/golden_butter/descripti: High quality butter made with golden cow's milk. Used in high level cooking recipes.
items/other/mill/golden_cheese/descripti: High quality cheese made with golden cow's milk. Used in high level cooking recipes.
items/other/mill/golden_duck_mayonnaise/: A high quality condiment made from duck eggs. Used in high level cooking recipes.
items/other/mill/golden_mayonnaise/descr: A high quality condiment made from chicken eggs. Used in high level cooking recipes.
items/other/mill/mayonnaise/description: A popular condiment made from chicken eggs. Used in a variety of cooking recipes.
items/other/mill/quality_hay/description: Quality feed for large animals. It can be placed in barn troughs or hand-fed.
items/other/mill/quality_small_animal_fe: Quality feed for small animals. It can be placed in coop troughs or hand-fed.
items/other/mill/rice/description: A bag of processed rice. Used as an ingredient in many kinds of dishes.
items/other/mill/small_grass_starter/des: Use this item to plant a patch of new grass on your farm. Useful for grazing animals.
items/other/mill/sugar/description: A bag of processed sugar. Used to sweeten dishes when cooking.
items/other/mill/ultimate_hay/descriptio: Ultimate feed for large animals. It can be placed in barn troughs or hand-fed.
items/other/mill/ultimate_small_animal_f: Ultimate feed for small animals. It can be placed in coop troughs or hand-fed.
